metadata.title: CVE-2016-7946 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
X.org libXi before 1.7.7 allows remote X servers to cause a denial ofservice (infinite loop) via vectors involving length fields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7946` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxi6 - 2:1.7.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxi package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.7.8-1').
